member.name: M:CV_ASP.NET_LECT.Controllers.ApplicationsController.GetApplications(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Applications with specific offerID and from selected pageNumber
member.remarks: Standard pageNo is 1 and pageSize is 4
